data.text:
Westfield London is a key London retail shopping destination, located in one of the most exciting regeneration areas of London. Westfield London is often seen as a catalyst for the future development and regeneration of the wider White City area, including Shepherd's Bush town centre.

The shopping destination continues to receive new stores, UK brand debuts and has recently seen an expansion.

Unibail-Rodamco-Westfield, the owners of the location, are a developer and operator of sustainable, high-quality real estate assets in some of the most dynamic cities in Europe and the United States. The Group operates 78 shopping centres in 12 countries, including 45 which carry the Westfield brand.

For more news about Westfield London, see our related stories below company information.
